issue.title: [Docs][Python] Add how to run doctests to the developer guide
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16709](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16709). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I have had some doctest failures on CI and I had to search over the docker-compose file how to run doctests:
```java

--doctest-modules --doctest-cython 
```
I think it would be a nice addition to add it to our Python developers guide on how to run tests.
